verses.verse: The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4427>reigns;<s%> let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice;<s%> let the <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H339>isles<s%> be <S%H8056>glad<s%> thereof.
<S%H6051>Clouds<s%> and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> are <S%H5439>round<s%> about him: <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> are the <S%H4349>habitation<s%> of his <S%H3678>throne.<s%>
A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3212>goes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and <S%H3857>burns<s%> up his <S%H6862>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

The <S%H2022>hills<s%> <S%H4549>melted<s%> like <S%H1749>wax<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H954>Confounded<s%> be <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H6459>graven<s%> images, that <S%H1984>boast<s%> themselves of <S%H457>idols:<s%> <S%H7812>worship<s%> him, <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and was <S%H8056>glad;<s%> and the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1523>rejoiced<s%> <S%H4616>because<s%> of your <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For you, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> are <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> you are <S%H5927>exalted<s%> <S%H3966>far<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

You that <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> he <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints;<s%> he <S%H5337>delivers<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
<S%H216>Light<s%> is <S%H2232>sown<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> and give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> at the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of his <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>
